website_summaries.verdict: This durable t-bar platform is easy to mount to your floor or rack, and will support a good amount of weight to help you strengthen your back.
pros: Designed to be used with 1-inch and 2-inch Olympic bars
Locks into frame tubing on any rack or bench
Locks into 2-inch tubing or bolts into the floor
cons: May be missing hardware upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: Fit under my home gym frame with no problem. I purchased this because I have a 7 foot standard bar. It is an excellent addition to my workout equipment. The 360 degree swivel action is great. The only comment that I have is there is no bar tightener for the standard bar; but there is one for the Olympic bar as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, works great with my olympic bar and other 1" bars. I have it attached to the base on my power rack and it works great! No slipping or tilting, and the tension screws hold everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got 2 weeks ago but works as expected. Seems like solid construction. Fit very well on my workout cage. Would recommend if not looking to spend a lot on a landmine.
customer_reviews.author: Dav33

customer_reviews.title: T bar rows anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item! Fits both Olympic AND standard bar. Very sturdy and easy to mount. The base of the unit swivels so that is very handy. DEFINITELY worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Frost Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Very effective to transform your workouts into powerful exercises for strength. Well made piece of equipment to give you diversity working out. Get it and learn how to truly work muscle groups not being used with conventional weights.
customer_reviews.author: Waterbox

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I don't like the fact that it slightly scratched my barbell with the handscrew, nothing major I just didn't like the idea. I will say that it works like a charm really smooth and really easy to install/use and it's a must have at any gym.
customer_reviews.author: lilman_18

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: the base is nice and study the tubing could have been more substantial, but it seems to be holding up well, should do the intended job
customer_reviews.author: Martin Borho

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice product and does exactly what it describes
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product and does exactly what it describes. I have a gym in my home with limited space and this is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: bob johnson

customer_reviews.title: No thumbscrews included.
customer_reviews.text: For 30.00, you don't expect to only receive a piece of metal and zero thumbscrews. Disappointed to say the least. Can not attatch to rack, and can't attatch bar to landmine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tresler

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great platform! Much heavier and solid than I thought it would be. Easily installed on my power rack and fit great. Works well with both standard and Olympic bars, Great value! Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: r.drew

customer_reviews.title: Adds Many New Exercises to Your Gym
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and smooth, this landmine device can add a lot of new exercises to your gym.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this t-bar platform, works exactly as described and takes one hell of a beating when I really load the bar up.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Soper

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. We attached it to the side of our power rack and ended up putting a cut 2x4 under it for a little support. It works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clamped this onto my TDS rack and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Zeeman

product_meta.title: Ivation T-Bar Row Platform – 360° Swivel for Easy Use in Tight Spaces – Fits 1” Standard & 2” Olympic Bars
product_meta.description:
Get all your workout ducks in a row!

 Enjoy the full benefits of a power gym at home for a super low price! The T-Bar Row Platform from Ivation is designed for a lifetime of heavy-duty back-blasting workouts right in your home gym. Build a solid back, greatly improve core muscles, and tone up some serious lats, traps, biceps, hamstrings, glutes, abs and more with numerous bent-over exercises made possible by this T-row platform. Create your own T-bar row machine by using a bar and weight set together with our platform, and put the “gym” in your home gym. Its full range up and down 360-degree swivel allows for use in tight spaces, so you can set up and work out anywhere in your home.

 What You Get

 

 * Ivation T-Bar Row Platform
   
 * The foundation of a full body gym
   
 * An affordable way to work out at home!

 Specs & Details

 

 * Material: Steel 
   
 * Dimensions: 10.5” x 5” x 6.25”
   
 * Weight: 7 lbs.
   
 * Use with 1” standard or 2” Olympic bars

 How to Enjoy

 

 * Bolt to floor or attach to frame tubing on base of dumbbell rack, bench, or racks
   
 * Use bar and weights together with platform to build strength and work various muscles
   
 * Use in tight spaces with 360° swivel
   
 * Enjoy your affordable gym anywhere in your home for a lifetime of fitness!

COMPACT FOR HOME GYM – Multiuse Design Gives You Large Variety of Workout Options in Tight Spaces; Benefits of a Weight Room in Your Living Room
AFFORDABLY PRICED – At the Low Ivation Price, Use Bar & Weights Together with the Platform for a Full Body Muscle Building Work Out
